description:
"A liquor for drinking is made of barley or grain, and fermented into a certain resemblance of wine."
Tacitus, De Origine et situ Germanorum, 98 AD.
tooltip:
Providing your soldiers with a steady supply of beer will make it much more attractive to join the army. On the other hand, drunk soldiers are admittedly usually not very good in battle...
-25% recruitment costs for all units, but also -10% health.
